Hero.title: Adam
Hero.subtitle: React Frontend Developer
Hero.description: I create modern web applications using React, Next.js and TypeScript. I specialize in building responsive and accessible user interfaces.

About.subtitle: A few words about me.
About.title: Who Am I?
About.description:
I am a passionate frontend developer with 3 years of experience, specializing in React and Next.js. I create modern, intuitive and fully responsive web interfaces that focus on user experience and aesthetics. I pay great attention to detail and always strive for clean, maintainable code.

Outside of programming, I enjoy running, reading and discovering new board games.

Feel free to check out my portfolio and contact me if you want to collaborate or just say hi!

portfolio.description: Modern portfolio built with Next.js 13, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. Features animations, dark mode, and full responsiveness.

ecommerce.description: E-commerce application with shopping cart, product filtering, and authentication system. Built with React and Redux Toolkit.

weather.description: Weather application using OpenWeather API. Allows checking current weather and forecasts for selected cities.
